dialogs.answer: This safe haven solution of copying and depositing elsewhere becomes necessary when the Physical Characteristics Principle (#16) is not met by the hosting country.
dialogs.text: The Blinken Open Society Archives in Budapest holds archives containing sensitive data including those of the UN Expert Commission on Investigating War Crimes in the former Yugoslavia. Copies of the data have been created and deposited to another institution, after the political climate in Hungary became increasingly hostile.
